ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 23
ygData.msgSnippet: ... An evil eye in East Karana. Evil Eyes are like an early Christmas. My friend found a Polished Bone Bracelet on one too. On the down side, following one
ygData.messageBody:
>Subject: Re: Gloves of Ralos Zekk
>
>
> Where and what did you get the glove off of? And what level was
>the creature? Thanks... I would figure the glove is more important and
>expensive than a "word".
>
>Zolthar
>

An evil eye in East Karana. Evil Eyes are like an early Christmas. My friend
found a Polished Bone Bracelet on one too.

On the down side, following one around like a puppy for a while and bashing my
party members while charmed wasn't that much fun. But we just cast root and
cancel magic on whoever gets charmed.

Also, Fuzboo of Bristlebane needs some runes :-)

Robert Davis
